ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How often is this true: I think about this person so much that it's hard for me to do the things I normally do?
How often is this true: Memories of the person who died upset me?
How often is this true: I feel I cannot accept the death of the person who died?
How often is this true: I feel myself longing for the person who died?
How often is this true: I feel drawn to places and things associated with the person who died?
How often is this true: I cannot help feeling angry about his/her death?
How often is this true: I feel disbelief over what happened?
How often is this true: I feel stunned or dazed over what happened?
How often is this true: Ever since s/he died it is hard for me to trust people?
How often is this true: Ever since s/he died I feel like I have lost the ability to care about other people or I feel distant from people I care about?
How often is this true: I have pain in the same area of my body or have some of the same symptoms as the person who died?
How often is this true: I go out of my way to avoid reminders of the person who died?
How often is this true: I feel that life is empty without the person who died?
How often is this true: I hear the voice of the person who died speak to me?
How often is this true: I see the person who died stand before me?
How often is this true: I feel that it is unfair that I should live when this person died?
How often is this true: I feel bitter over this person's death?
How often is this true: I feel envious of others who have not lost someone close?
How often is this true: I feel lonely a great deal of the time ever since s/he died?
ICG Score:
